entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
